summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the railway franchise to the Great Northern Railway Company, its successors and assigns, along, upon, over and across parts of 20th Avenue West and Lawton Way; amending Section 1 thereof to establish the expiration date as July 7, 1993, subject to termination by the City after July 7, 1978 and amending Section 8 to broaden the indemnity provisions thereof and providing for an thereof and providing for an acceptance.
